text: Simone Antonini (born 12 February 1991) is an Italian former professional racing cyclist, who rode professionally between 2014 and 2018 for the and squads. ==Major results== ;2014 : 1st 20px Overall Giro del Friuli-Venezia Giulia ::1st Stage 1a (TTT) ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:People from Empoli Category:Sportspeople from Tuscany
title: Simone Antonini
